mapper.select: select pc.projectcommentNo, pc.projectNo, pc.userNo, pc.content, pc.regDate, u.nickname from projectcomment pc, users u where pc.userNo = u.userNo and pc.open=1 and projectNo = #{projectNo};
mapper.insert: insert into projectComment(projectNo, userNo, content, open) values( #{projectNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, 1 )
mapper.update: update projectComment set content = #{content} where projectCommentNo = #{projectCommentNo}
